bugs.component: Core:DOM: Copy & Paste and Drag & Drop
bugs.summary: Drag and drop from File Explorer is no longer allowed after drag and drop an image within the content area.
Export more MathML reftests to WPT
Telemetry Ping for User Hardware Characteristics
Turn on argument linting from no-unused-vars
Remove the legacy ETP webcompat reporter
Update spotless to the latest for support newer ktlint
Allow No Initial Selection in XUL MenuList
